official_title: To amend the Truth in Lending Act to require lenders to post current interest rates charged for various categories of loans to consumers.

summary.text: Amends the Truth in Lending Act to require lenders to post, in clear and conspicuous language, current interest rates for all categories of consumer loans. Requires the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to prescribe regulations to carry out this Act.

titles.title: To amend the Truth in Lending Act to require lenders to post current interest rates charged for various categories of loans to consumers.
